Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan has suffered three consecutive losses, including an eight-wicket defeat to Afghanistan.
South Africa has emerged as one of the most commanding teams in the tournament with a massive 149-run win over Bangladesh.
The Proteas batting has been a massive strength with the likes of Quinton de Kock, Henrich Klassen, Aiden Markram and more scoring fluently.
Their bowling has looked in great form, especially the pacers, who have regularly picked up wickets in the early stage of the innings.
Proteas captain Temba Bavuma and fast bowler Lungi Ngidi missed the previous game against Bangladesh due to injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai has produced balanced wickets with an average score of 245.
Fast bowlers can generate some movement and bounce with the new ball, while spinners generally wickets as the ball starts gripping.
Others: South Africa has a better chance to win this fixture and defeat Pakistan to register their fifth win in the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
